This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my way to work this morning when while riding on the CTA Purple Line train heading up along the north side of Chicago. I happen to look out the window just right before sunrise, I saw a bright shining object up in the sky toward over the lake, of what I thought it was to be a light ontop of a building of some sort, and then it moved. it had multi colored lights flashing around of this bright object. I do NOT know what it was but it sure was spooky! Especially when the moon was so full this morning, the whole thing had just looked so eerie...
